cab.content: Printed for the War Cabinet. December 1940.SECRET Copy No.W.P. (G) (41) 2.December 31, 1940.WAR CABINET.ROYAL AIR FORCE BENEVOLENT FUND.Memorandum by the Minister of Aircraft Production.I PROPOSE that the Cabinet should instruct the Chancellor of theExchequer to pay from public funds the sum of one million pounds to theRoyal Air Force Benevolent Fund.This proposal is put forward with confidence.The voluntary contributions which the public have sent this ministry for the purchase of aircraft amount to nearly nine million pounds.Three-quarters of this sum comes from overseas and is therefore a netaddition to the financial resources at the disposal of the Treasury.B.Ministry of Aircraft Production,December 31, 1940.[22072]
